Activity: Review financial news and market performance. Briefly check emails.
Respond to emails, prioritizing those requiring immediate action. Review the preliminary report from yesterday and identify areas needing further clarification.
Meeting with Data Science team (@dsde-1, @dsde-2) to discuss data requirements for the top statistical arbitrage strategies. Validate data availability, quality, and potential costs.
Analyze the data availability report from @dsde-1 and @dsde-2. Refine the strategy ranking based on data limitations and potential costs.
Prepare a presentation for the executive team, outlining the top 3 statistical arbitrage strategies, their potential returns, risks, and regulatory considerations. Include a detailed cost analysis.
Lunch Break. Review the presentation and practice delivery.
Present the proposed strategies to the COO (@coo-1) and Head of Investor Relations (@ir-1). Address their concerns and incorporate their feedback into the strategy selection process.
Based on feedback from the executive team, finalize the strategy selection. Document the rationale for the chosen strategy and its alignment with the fund's objectives and risk tolerance.
Meet with @comp-1 to discuss compliance requirements for the selected strategy. Develop a compliance plan to ensure adherence to SEC regulations.
Review tomorrow's schedule and prepare for upcoming meetings. Respond to any remaining emails.
